name: Oaken Sentinel
description: The Oaken Sentinel is a massive plant creature resembling a sturdy oak tree, camouflaged within natural surroundings.
memorable: Its ability to immobilize foes with grappling branches makes it a fearsome guardian.
goals: To protect natural spaces and control its environment.
relations: May be encountered alongside other forest creatures or guardians.
environment: Typically found in forests or other natural spaces.
strengths: High hit points and the ability to grapple and restrain enemies.
weaknesses: Vulnerable to lightning damage, limited mobility.
attacks: Its Grasping Branches can grapple enemies from a distance and deal bludgeoning damage, or it can hurl rocks at foes.
most_powerful_ability: Grasping Branches allows the Sentinel to immobilize multiple targets with strong, extendable branches.
senses: Blindsight extending 120 feet allows it to perceive its surroundings despite being immobile.
skills: Limited perception due to low Wisdom, resulting in a passive perception of 9.
additional_information: Can create up to six Grasping Branches at once.
Has False Appearance ability to blend into its environment.
Grappling a target makes them take damage each turn until they escape.
Grasping Branches have their own hit points and armor class.
Destroying a branch does not harm the Oaken Sentinel.
test_queries: massive tree creature that grapples foes
guardian of natural spaces with gripping branches
oak monster that blends into forests
plant creature with strong bludgeoning attacks
defensive giant plant with lightning vulnerability
